website_summaries.verdict: Adored for its gorgeous slim profile, this model is the shoe that launched the New Balance 696 series. It  comes in a variety of refreshing colors to accommodate different style preferences. The blend of soft mesh and suede coverage on this sporty sneaker gives it a luxurious spin. It has eliminated the chunks of padding on all sides, maintaining its reliability with the right mix of adequate cushioning, support, and breathability in a lightweight build. It won hearts as it offers plenty of functional features at a very decent cost.
pros: Reviewers of the New Balance 696 women’s sneaker rave about how pretty-looking this shoe and that they can match it with lots of casual clothes
New Balance 696 reviews reveal that buyers loved the slim shape of this sneaker
Strings of reviewers vouch that this kick from the New Balance lifestyle line is very comfortable and well-cushioned
The New Balance 696 is very durable despite its affordable price tag, according to lots of users
The women’s specific New Balance 696 sneaker is supportive enough according to some wearers who donned this during light workouts in the gym
Heaps of wear-testers affirm that this kick is very comfortable to wear right out of the box
The actual shoe is as lovely as the images online, quite a lot of wearers have declared
A couple of reviewers say the shoe isn’t bulky on foot
The sparkly accents on the breathable mesh in some variations are very subtle, noted by some
Many who have tried this on said it fits great with an athletic sock
cons: At least one dissatisfied reviewer feel that New Balance had gone downhill with this shoe due to its lack of arch support
One buyer thought this shoe didn’t offer enough room for shoe inserts

customer_reviews.title: I have two pairs of this shoe and love them. I’m trying to decide on color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size so I returned them. I have two pairs of this shoe and love them. I’m trying to decide on color. They are are cute and I get many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: S. Farr

customer_reviews.title: good fit...couldn't get past the color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on a whim when I saw them at a ridiculously low price...however...I just couldn't get past the color which is brighter like yellow mustard or something in person! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: I am 4 YHWH r u

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable. I have a lot of foot problems and these are excellent. I did add insoles to them but the shoe quality is what I love most.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, look great and wearing well! I will probalby get another pair in different color.
customer_reviews.author: S. P.

customer_reviews.title: Retro
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I get lots of compliments on the retro look. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. Very stylish and comfortable. I got mucho compliments too.
customer_reviews.author: Talibah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not the shade of yellow shown in picture. Much more mustardy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schiel

customer_reviews.title: Color is WAY off on the yellow pair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so upset. I ordered the yellow and they are TAN!!!!! Your picture is deceiving to this yellow pair!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Margarette Jess

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, cute and good quality. I'm thinking about buy another color
customer_reviews.author: Cnardino

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the color is different!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is nice but the color isn’t the same on pictures. It looks like an old mustard color instead of cheerful and happy light yellow. It’s not what im looking for so gotta return it to the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Alana T.

customer_reviews.title: My magic shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! I wore them all day in Disneyland. The others in my group were complains of back pain half way through the day. I made it open to close and can’t stop talking about how great these shoes are!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Bulky look and fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were much more bulky than I expected. They look a size too big even though they are the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: lauren b

customer_reviews.title: great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneaker, Love the color and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Loonygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are comfortable and cute!!! They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Extremely narrow. Odd fitting. Awful color was not what it looks like on line. Just yuck
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always love classic New Balances. The orange is a great color variation on this classic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Ringer

customer_reviews.title: wrong color, too small
customer_reviews.text: The color was indigo, and the 7.5 is way too small. It fits like a 7
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes they are great for game day in Knoxville!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Most likely FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been worn twice and appear to be falling apart. I do not think they are authentic New Balance. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: jmmrox
